description:
So while the left believed fake PR videos with Doritos would hold Kamala's hand all the way to the ballot box, the exact opposite was proved true. So while any stunt with these nacho cheese chips should have ended where it started, Kamala decided to triple down.

Kamala Harris gave an interview at HumanX, an AI conference, on March 9. This is where she discussed how she ate her favorite snack while watching the Oscars and attempted to relate it to innovation.

Kamala Harris shares her story of ordering doritos on doordash to explain how consumer demand could reshape AI to tackle larger issues like affordable housing.

again, don’t tell me she has a messaging problem or uses big words when we all know the REAL reason ppl didn’t listen‼️
title: Failed Democrat presidential candidate tried ordering Doritos using DoorDash once, claims it's just like AI

description:
So it turns out that slandering half the country as racist and misogynistic does not win elections. The Dems have yet to accept that, as they are deeply blinded by their hatred towards Trump.

Van Jones went on CNN Sunday and said the quiet part out loud, which is that the Dems are "screwed.”

CNN's Van Jones on the Democrat Party:

"We're SCREWED." pic.twitter.com/rRxmSq0I68
— Trending Politics (@tpbreaking) March 10, 2025

title: "I don't wanna talk about my own party": Van Jones has no answer for why Democrats are so terrible lately

description:
Jasmine Crockett says a lot of dumb things but she may have made one of her dumbest claims yet.

On Saturday, Crockett appeared on “The Katie Phang Show” where she claimed “It is not a criminal violation to enter the country illegally," emphasizing that "It’s not a crime."

REP. CROCKETT: “It is not a criminal violation to enter the country illegally! It’s not a crime!”

She's gotta be the dumbest member of Congress. pic.twitter.com/83q10s9Qe5
— Breaking911 (@Breaking911) March 9, 2025

I am no legal expert but the last
title: Jasmine Crockett makes one of her silliest claims yet, where the so-called lawyer does know what the laws are

description:
The City of Los Angeles is currently suffering from a zombie apocalypse, and officials have worsened the problem while condoning the degeneracy fueling this epidemic. So rather than focus all its efforts on reducing the homeless population, the city has decided its most crucial fight is to put an end to treehouses that are not permitted to be ADA compliant.

NEW: Simpsons producer Rick Polizzi forced to demolish his 24-year-old Simpsons-inspired treehouse after the city of LA demanded he permit it like a "single-family dwelling."

Thousands of homes burned down and this is what LA is worried about. Lunacy.
title: "Simpsons" producer suddenly realizes how terrible Los Angeles government is when they make him tear down his treehouse

description:

title: Trudeau Out, Carney In: Who Is Canada’s Anti-Trump Puppet?

description:
Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is officially out, and we’ve studied up on his replacement, Mark Carney. Lane the Brain was on the ground at SXSW this weekend to soak in the leftism and discuss DEI with woke Arlington, Texas mayor Jim Ross. John Oliver is upset about migrants in ICE detention facilities and believes that illegally entering a country doesn’t make someone a criminal, among other topics!

title: Trudeau Out, Carney In: Who Is Canada’s Anti-Trump Puppet? (Sources)

description:
Democrats are on the wrong side of history of many 80/20 issues. When America represents 80%, they go all in on the 20%. The big issue dominating the news as of late is allowing boys to use the girl's locker room and/or unfairly compete against them in sports. 80% of Americans support not allowing boys to do that. 20% of Americans think 80% are transphobes.

We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website are firmly with the 80%, and we're not ones to help advise the 20%. However, for the sake of being charitable, if we can offer some free advice, if you are attending a hearing to defend allowing boys in the girl's locker room, saying things like this does not help your cause:

Medically, on paper, she is girl. She is just as much a girl as every single other one of those girls in there. So she has a penis, guess wha
title: Blue-haired mom defends trans "daughter" being in the locker room because, quote, "90% of the time it’s flaccid"

description:
If you see a politician out with their three-year-old daughter—ANY politician—and choose to make her feel anxious and scared, you are, in point of fact, the bad guy in the situation. Or, as JD Vance eloquently stated this weekend regarding his own daughter, you're a sh*t person. The Cincinnati chapter of the "We Heart Zelenskyy" fan club did this over the weekend, and the Vice President was less than amused.

"It was a mostly respectful conversation, but if you’re chasing a 3-year-old as part of a political protest, you’re a shit person."

Today while walking my 3 year old daughter a group of “Slava Ukraini” protesters followed us around and shouted as my daughter grew increasingly anxious and scared.

I decided to speak with the protesters in the hopes tha
title: Pro-Ukraine protestors accost JD Vance's 3-year-old daughter while out with her dad, yet Vance still responds with class
